Login Customization

For more details on the possibilities of login customization see Login Customization

Currently all login look the same. They are customized on Okta side to fulfill the basic requiredments for Questback products. (Solution 1: Using the Okta Hosted Login Page)

Error customization

Error customization is done in two ways:

  1. The Okta error page is customized to show a Questback layout.

  2. Errors are redirected to the respective applications as possible - customization is done in the specific application

Email Customization

There are some customizations. see bitbucket
